titles.title: Only Jesus Can Satisfy Your Soul

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
The world will try to satisfy that longing in your soul.
You may search the wide world o'er but you'll be just as before

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
You'll never find true satisfaction until you've found the Lord
For only Jesus can satisfy your soul.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Only Jesus can satisfy your soul
And only He can change your heart
and make you whole

verse.name: c1b
v2a
verse.lines:
If you could have the fame and fortune
All the wealth you could obtain
Yet you have not Christ within, your livng here would be in vain

verse.name: v2b
